description.value:
Prerequisite: Elf, avenger, oath of enmity power

Benefit: When you use your elven accuracy racial power to reroll an attack roll made against your oath of enmity target and you hit, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against that target until the end of your next turn.

The bonus increases to +4 at 11th level and +6 at 21st level.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 134.
